overview: Anthology film. In "The Limousine Man", a man who lives by forcing children to sell flowers and beg, when an androgynous creature gets involved in his organisation. In "Tarantula", a serial killer is looking for her father among beggars and ragpickers. In "Sleeping Beauty" a woman brings her father's corpse to a Koulis the Barber, a mortuary beautician.
title: The Court of Scum
